name: Racing Game - Unity education project
description:
• This game made for educational purposes, to learn basics of Unity.
  • The full development time is only 5 hours 
  • If you want to edit this game, or check out how this works, you can download the full source project from here: http://bit.ly/2THJLMR

Used only free assets:

  • Lake Race Track: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environment...
  • Medieval house: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environme...
  • USSC Brig Sloop: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/ve7...
  • Church Model: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environment...
  • Standard Assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essen...

Maybe I'll develop it further on the future. We'll see :)
